ing: 2 green apples - washed, cored and cubed
1 head romaine lettuce - rinsed, dried, and chopped
des: "This sour apple salad is both nutritious and delicious - it contains fruit, vegetables and seeds.  You can use any type of dressing and lettuce in this recipe."
ins: In a large bowl, mix together the apples, sunflower seeds, lettuce, pickles and tomato.  Pour dressing on top, toss and enjoy!
